content.raw: A lot of the problems That I'm having are common with the default branch, but since we most likely to continue working from this branch I guess I should list them: 1- Adding a book shelf I get a warning ```THREE.WebGLRenderer: image is not power of two (496x329). Resized to 512x256 ​``` and the book shelf doesn't appear after about 30 seconds the book shelf does appear. 2- gzweb weird initial poses: Fast food model initial pose is under the ground while some are on the ground, some are flying, I tried adding the same models from Gzclient and their initial poses were correct [all on the ground].
content.html:
A lot of the problems That I'm having are common with the default branch, but since we most likely to continue working from this branch I guess I should list them: 1- Adding a book shelf I get a warning THREE.WebGLRenderer: image is not power of two (496x329). Resized to 512x256 <img src=​"assets/​media/​materials/​textures/​wood.png">​ and the book shelf doesn't appear after about 30 seconds the book shelf does appear.

2- gzweb weird initial poses: Fast food model initial pose is under the ground while some are on the ground, some are flying, I tried adding the same models from Gzclient and their initial poses were correct [all on the ground].
